trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 9th 2000
Summary: Rotating oval lights of red,green, and blue lights
divs: Sighting DetailsWhere were you and what were you doing at the time? Walking to visitfamily.What made you first notice the object? Strange pattern of lightsWhat didyou think the object was when you first noticed it? Police Helicopter Describeyour reactions and actions during and after sighting the object. Well at firstwe were puzzled as to what it actually was, that we we seeing. Then it seemedas if we all were caught up in a slow motion sequence of a film, and thingsseemed alot longer in duration than normal. Describe the object and its actions. It was traveling north and pulsated in a rotation like a pattern, then shot northeast very suddenly. That is when the pattern of the lights grew into colors of red,green, and blue. How did you lose sight of the object? Treesbelow made us loose the object.
